Name: Solitaire Knights
About the game: Let's Sit and Play Cards. Solitaire Knights is just the best darn solitaire you can get. With gorgeous, fully 3D graphics and intuitive card control you can spend hours avoiding real work. Unlock epic achievements as you play! Upcoming releases will add more game modes fuelled by your addiction to solitaire.
